name: Double Teeth
description: Available in Solid Silver or Bronze. Prices starting at 115.00. Bendable, Unisex.

name: Horse Skull Ring
description:
Solid sterling silver Horse Skull ring. Detailed original LAS sculpture. Shown here in raw silver, no antique finish.  Custom sizes are available,  Please specify size in note area when checking out.

Please note the menu- Bronze options now available!

name: Dinocity Wrist Cuff
description:
Fiercesome teeth emerge from the base of this sturdy yet bendable heavy metal cuff. 
Hinting at bone-like structure, the ends of the cuff comfortably wrap the arm. Whatever should suit the wearer, closer to wrist, or up on forearm.

Shown here in oxidized bronze.
Available in bronze, white bronze, or oxidized bronze (black).


**Oxidized bronze is a treatment that will wear and age with time. It will not stay completely dark for good, but will continue to come away revealing the bronze beneath for a beautiful antique look. Please consider this when ordering.
**Also please consider that white bronze is not a true silver, as it has light yellowish undertones.

name: Dinocity Arm Cuff
description:
Fiercesome teeth emerge from the base of this large and sturdy yet bendable heavy metal arm cuff. 
Hinting at bone-like structure, the ends of the cuff comfortably wrap the arm. Whatever should suit the wearer, above or below the elbow.

Shown here in white bronze and oxidized bronze.
Available in bronze, white bronze, or oxidized bronze (black).


**Oxidized bronze is a treatment that will wear and age with time. It will not stay completely dark for good, but will continue to come away revealing the bronze beneath for a beautiful antique look. Please consider this when ordering.
**Also please consider that white bronze is not a true silver, as it has light yellowish undertones.

name: Triceratops Bolo Necklace
description:
Triceratops pendant hangs amidst 4 strands of silver toned chain. Clasp closure and LAS metal jewelry tag at back. Chains hang approx 12". 

Shown here in raw bronze (an overall lighter tone, unfinished metal). 
Unisex, and pendant available in raw bronze, bronze, white bronze, and oxidized bronze (black.)

**Oxidized bronze is a treatment that will wear and age with time. It will not stay completely dark for good, but will continue to come away revealing the bronze beneath for a beautiful antique look. Please consider this when ordering.
**Also please consider that white bronze is not a true silver, as it has light yellowish undertones.

name: Archaeopteryx Skull Ring
description:
Borrowing the best traits from the amazing prehistoric flying creature, the Archaeopteryx, and mixed with some fictional elements, we bring you a skull ring that doubles as a miniature sculpture.  Unisex, and available in bronze, white bronze, oxidized bronze (black), and rose gold plated bronze.

Bottom jaw can be adjusted to custom fit your finger.
Sizes 4.5-12 are available. PLEASE SPECIFY SIZE IN NOTE AREA WHEN CHECKING OUT.

**Oxidized bronze is a treatment that will wear and age with time. It will not stay completely dark for good, but will continue to come away revealing the bronze beneath for a beautiful antique look. Please consider this when ordering.
**Also please consider that white bronze is not a true silver, as it has light yellowish undertones.

name: Triceratops Ring
description:
This creature's spiky shield sits comfortably across your finger, his detailed and artfully distressed skull spans approx 2.5". Shown here in antiqued, tumbled bronze. Unisex, and available in bronze, white bronze, and oxidized bronze (black.)

Sizes 4.5-12 are available. PLEASE SPECIFY SIZE IN NOTE AREA WHEN CHECKING OUT.

**Oxidized bronze is a treatment that will wear and age with time. It will not stay completely dark for good, but will continue to come away revealing the bronze beneath for a beautiful antique look. Please consider this when ordering.
**Also please consider that white bronze is not a true silver, as it has light yellowish undertones.

name: Spiky Cat Skull Ring
description:
A cousin of the Sabertooth, this fantastical crazy cat comes complete with a row of skull spikes and a set of serious fangs. Unisex, and available in bronze, white bronze, oxidized bronze (black), and rose gold plate.

Sizes 4.5-12 are available. PLEASE SPECIFY SIZE IN NOTE AREA WHEN CHECKING OUT.

**Oxidized bronze is a treatment that will wear and age with time. It will not stay completely dark for good, but will continue to come away revealing the bronze beneath for a beautiful antique look. Please consider this when ordering.
**Also please consider that white bronze is not a true silver, as it has light yellowish undertones.

name: Spiky Dino Head Ring
description:
With intense attention detail, this fierce and fictional Dino is both a ring and a miniature sculpture. Unisex, and available in bronze, white bronze, oxidized bronze (black), and rose gold plate. Bottom jaw can be resized to custom fit your finger.

Sizes 4.5-12 are available. PLEASE SPECIFY SIZE IN NOTE AREA WHEN CHECKING OUT.

**Oxidized bronze is a treatment that will wear and age with time. It will not stay completely dark for good, but will continue to come away revealing the bronze beneath for a beautiful antique look. Please consider this when ordering.
**Also please consider that white bronze is not a true silver, as it has light yellowish undertones.

name: Prism Earrings
description: Pair of oxidized bronze prism drop earrings. White bronze tri-claw emerges from the center... hand made sterling silver hooks.

name: TriTeeth Necklace
description:
Oxidized bronze triangle pendant baring a set of rose gold plated teeth. Long double chains suspended from the middle, antiqued bronze spike claw charms at the tips. Chain around neck approx 20". Clasp at back, with official LAS metal jewelry tag.

Please note LAS uses repurposed chain when possible. We love to use things that already exist in this world.

name: Double Unicorn Skull Necklace
description:
Double the fierceness. Antiqued white bronze, intricately detailed, double Unicorn Skull pendant with rose gold plated horns. Reminiscent of a bolo style necklace, with long, multiple mixed metal chains. Clasp at back, official LAS metal jewelry tag. Chain measures approx 20" around neck.

Please note LAS uses repurposed chain when possible. We love to use things already existing in this world.

name: Double Spike Claw Necklace
description: Silver toned chain adorned with two of the LAS Spike Claw charms. Charms are oxidized bronze, antiqued matte black in appearance. Approx 20" in length, charms hang in asymmetrical fashion.

name: Two-Toned Bronze and Rose Gold Uni-Teeth Ring
description:
Collected and cast Unicorn teeth set into a double finger adjustable ring. Two-toned finish, rose gold plated teeth set into polished white bronze. Pull or push on ring bands to adjust to fingers. 
One Size.

name: Oxidized Bronze Uni-Teeth Ring
description:
Collected and cast Unicorn teeth set into a double finger adjustable ring. Oxidization with wear with time, resulting in a beautiful antiqued finish. Pull or push on ring bands to adjust to fingers. 
One Size.

name: Two-Toned Bronze and Rose Gold Unicorn Skull Ring
description:
Two-toned Unicorn skull ring, originally sculpted by LAS. Rose gold plated horn sits atop ntricately detailed, thinly cracked, white bronze skull. Check this friend in your luggage during travel as he is a fierce creature.

Please specify desired custom size when checking out.

name: Oxidized Bronze Unicorn Skull Ring
description:
Unicorn skull ring, originally sculpted by LAS. Intricately detailed, thinly cracked, oxidized bronze will wear beautifully away as time goes on. 
Check this friend in your luggage during travel as he is a fierce creature.

Please specify desired custom size when checking out.

name: Birdie Ring
description:
Graceful, fierce bird head, sculpted cascading feathers, sits comfortably and diagonally wrapped around the finger. Note the tiny little teeth carved into the beak...Recommended for the right hand, but will work for either. Comes in white bronze and regular bronze, antiqued finish.

Sizes 4.5-12 are available. PLEASE SPECIFY SIZE IN NOTE AREA WHEN CHECKING OUT.

**Oxidized bronze is a treatment that will wear and age with time. It will not stay completely dark for good, but will continue to come away revealing the bronze beneath for a beautiful antique look. Please consider this when ordering.
**Also please consider that white bronze is not a true silver, as it has light yellowish undertones.

name: The Reef Cuff
description: An ambiguous hybrid of sea life in metallic form...a part of sea foliage or a fin... that is up to the viewer. Pictured here in regular bronze with an antique finish.

name: The Geo Bangle
description: A bangle cuff of roughly cut geo shapes and spikes. Available in oxidized bronze (pictured here). Also available in white bronze and regular bronze.

name: LAS Shipping/Order Turn-over and Return Policy
description:
Hey all!
here's the word on what you have ordered...

**LAS makes to order, which means, once you've ordered, we put your custom order into our studio and have it made just for you! 
The time of placed order til the time the package arrives to you is approximately three weeks, give or take a couple of days. It takes about 12-14 BUSINESS days to fill orders, plus travel time to you!
We of course try and get your order done as soon as we can, but since they are custom orders, we want to allow sufficient time!

We ship United States Postal Service, and all LAS shipping costs are based on USPS prices.

**In regards to RINGS, we request you have solidified your personal size before ordering a custom ring size. We DO NOT accept returns on rings if: 
*you have requested a certain size and find it doesn't fit once you have received it. Reason being that LAS has custom made each piece.

**If you happen to receive the wrong size, etc. BY OUR MISTAKE, we ask that you send the item(s) back to us, and we will refund your shipping via PayPal! We will then send you the correct item.

**If you are truly unsatisfied with your product, we ask you send the product back to us, and we will issue a credit for our online store never to expire.

**If item(s) ordered from here, our site, happen to arrive damaged, we ask that you send the item(s) back to us, and we will refund your shipping via PayPal! We will then replace item(s) when photograph of damaged goods is submitted to us via email at no cost to you.

**LAS does not except returns of our goods straight to us if purchased from retail stores that carry our line.

categories.name: LAS Order Info and Return Policy
